law.catch_line: An individual whose DNA record or profile is included in the statewide DNA data base system and whos...

text.section: An individual whose DNA record or profile is included in the statewide DNA data base system and whose DNA sample is stored in the statewide DNA repository may request that information be expunged on the grounds that the conviction that resulted in the inclusion meets the expungement criteria specified in § 10-105 or § 10-106 of the Criminal Procedure Article.
Expungement proceedings shall be conducted in accordance with § 10-105 or § 10-106 of the Criminal Procedure Article.

On receipt of an order of expungement, the Director shall purge any DNA record, DNA sample, or other identifiable information covered by the order from the statewide DNA data base system and the statewide DNA repository.
